DOC.criteria: ICU patient elder 18 year age ( APACHE II ) score > 15 Patients expect remain ICU 2 day Patients consented DoNotResuscitate document Patients expect survive 2 day Patients returned ICU due condition worsen previously leave ICU Patients transfer ICU hospital .
